text:
02 of 15 SHOWING HER STRIPES Stefanie Keenan/Getty The Honest Company co-founder proves she's got the glow while keeping her baby belly under wraps in The Great's The Tie Sleeve Big Shirt ($295) during an event in West Hollywood on July 26. Finish the Look! Womens Strappy Block Heel Ankle Strap Sandals ($25 to $42), amazon.com

03 of 15 IN FINE FEATHER Theo Wargo/Getty The star stops by The Tonight Show on Aug. 4, chatting with Jimmy Fallon about her bundle of joy on the way while serving leg in thigh-high black boots and the short Feathery Wrap Silk Dress ($895) by Zimmerman. Finish the Look! Pointy Toe Stiletto Heel Thigh High Boot ($22.50 to $49.50), amazon.com

04 of 15 DARE TO BARE Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty At her Aug. 5 Honest event, the expectant mama continues to keep her bump hidden under The Great's Carnival Dress ($450). Finish the Look! Qupid Women's Chester-13 Boot ($9.50 to $47), amazon.com

05 of 15 FLIRTY FLORALS Splash News Alba is all smiles as she's spotted out in New York City wearing the Tanya Taylor Textured Silk Abstract Floral Amylia Dress ($595). Finish the Look! Marco M. Kelly Tote Bag with Shoulder Strap ($35), amazon.com

06 of 15 MAMA KIMONOS BEST Gotpap/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images The Sin City star looks comfortable and stylish in Topshop's Floral Print Maxi Kimono Jacket ($130) on Aug. 17, attending the opening night of Hamilton at the Pantages Theater in Hollywood, California. Finish the Look! Steve Madden Verdict Platform Sandal ($100), nordstrom.com

07 of 15 INTO THE BLUE BG008/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images Blue for a boy! For a day out in L.A. with Warren, Alba opts for a pair of casual blue wide-leg overalls and a long gray sweater, shielding her eyes from the sun in a pair of Elie Saab round-framed sunglasses ($982). Finish the Look! Loose Baggy Linen Wide-Leg Overalls ($20), amazon.com; EttelLut Long Open-Front Lightweight Cardigan ($15 to $20), amazon.com

08 of 15 CAMO QUEEN The Image Direct Bump in the road! The mom-to-be has her arms full with the Anya Hindmarch Ebury Smiley Large Shopper Bag ($995) — which matches her black knee-length dress and camo jacket — while out in L.A. on Aug. 25. Finish the Look! Liu & Qu Knee-Length Maternity Dress ($13 to $16), amazon.com; Escalier Women's Military Camo Jacket ($22 to $28), amazon.com

09 of 15 FASHION-WEEK FLAIR Raymond Hall/GC Images It's never too early to start encouraging love for the Big Apple! Alba keeps it casual in New York City during the city's infamous Fashion Week, strolling the streets on Sept. 8 in Topshop's Acid Wash Tank Top ($25). Finish the Look! Charles Richards Gray Overcoat ($22 to $29), amazon.com; Vince Women's Warren Sneaker ($157.50 to $225), amazon.com

10 of 15 IN THE NAVY Jackson Lee/Splash News Online Alba is all about the coordinating navy on Sept. 26, wearing a long Yeon jacket, knee-length dress and ankle-strap platform sandals in the same color while hosting the Building a Brand In a Mobile First World event in N.Y.C. Finish the Look! Tommy Hilfiger Women's Long Quilted Jacket with Hood (similar; $76 to $139), amazon.com; Delcoce Navy T-Shirt Dress ($16), amazon.com; Mila Lady Platform Chunky Heels ($30 to $40), amazon.com

11 of 15 BUMPING IN BLACK Splash News Sometimes simple is best! In late October, the third-time mom-to-be shows off her baby bump in a knee-length fitted black dress and matching overcoat, finishing her ensemble with navy and white platform sneakers and a matching handbag. Get the Look! BlackCherry Women's Sleeveless Modal Maternity Maxi Tank Dress ($24 to $30), amazon.com; Lingswallow Women's Long Sleeve Slim Blazer Long Lapel Trench ($26), amazon.com; Synthetic Cotton White Platform Slip-On Sneakers ($42), amazon.com

12 of 15 SHOW WOMAN Craig Barritt/Getty Images On Oct. 25, the busy entrepreneur attends Passion Play: How Jessica Alba and Mario Batali Created Multichannel Marvels during the Fast Company Innovation Festival in N.Y.C., rocking a long navy coat with a botanical print over a fitted white dress. Get the Look! BlackCherry Women's Sleeveless Modal Maternity Maxi Tank Dress ($24 to $30), amazon.com; HaoDuoYi Open-Front Cape Trench ($27), amazon.com

13 of 15 KEEPING WARM Raymond Hall/GC Images Alba is spotted hitting the streets of N.Y.C.'s SoHo neighborhood on Oct. 26, wearing Sandro's Hiroko Coat ($680) from their Fall/Winter 2017 Collection and the Citizens of Humanity Maternity Racer Low Rise Skinny in Black Leatherette ($238). Finish the Look! Covelin Leather Cross Body Shoulder Bag ($22), amazon.com; Vince Women's Warren Sneaker ($157.50 to $225), amazon.com

14 of 15 HOME SWEET HOME Splash News Fresh off the heels of her N.Y.C. trip, the star strolls through LAX on Oct. 27 in a dark-blue and tan striped jumpsuit under multiple outer layers, including Maje's Mars Oversize Open-Front Cardigan ($645). Alba accessorized with the Gerard Darel Cherry Hat in Indigo ($126). Finish the Look! Chloe Maternity Jumpsuit ($130), nordstrom.com; Synthetic Cotton White Platform Slip-On Sneakers ($42), amazon.com; Dasein Quilted Cross-body Bag with Chain Strap ($30), amazon.com
title: Jessica Alba's Maternity Style: Photos

meta_data.description: From overalls to off-the-shoulder dresses and short, flirty frocks, Jessica Alba's maternity looks in her third pregnancy are completely on point
meta_data.sailthru.author: Anya Leon
